short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crossplatform configuration tool for openLRSng project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
openLRSng (open LRS next generation) configuration utility

Featuring:
- TX module configuration
- RX module configuration through TX
- Spectrum Analyzer
- Firmware Flasher
- Configuration backup & restore
- much more...
